column2: We Who Eat need no reason for war! Let the sea run red!
Our Gods crave the blood of Who We Eat! By declaring this war, we can capture as many sacrificial slaves for our mirky altars.

Sekolah teaches us to save our strength for Who We Eat. To attack a fellow Sahuagin, is akin to slaying a noble son of Sekolah. For such blasphemy, tales of your misdeeds have spread across Seros, but perhaps you can still salvage your reputation.
By the Gods, are we not bred for war and battle?
Err, a war you say? No, I would never...
Your recent actions have disgraced We Who Eat. Already there is talk of a Blood Challenge...
It was inevitable, to have an irate warrior challenge your rightful rule. A duel to the death, or banishment and exile, the choice is unfavorable.
